channel.title: +1 Forward - Armour Astir Advent
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/armour-astir-advent
Rach and Rich bring on Briar Sovereign to talk about their game about mecha and magic.
Timecodes: 0:01:09 - Read a Sitch about using play-by-post to bridge live game sessions! 0:10:00 - Open Your Brain to *Armour Astir Advent* 0:16:01 - Act Under Fire with Plussy and Chantel as they take on some mechs
Briar's Twitter: https://twitter.com/weregazelle Briar's Itch store: https://weregazelle.itch.io/
